D

drive(int) - Method in interface uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.objects.Car
Drive the car for a given number of kilometres.
drive(int) - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.objects.LargeCar
The Large Car uses fuel at a slightly different consumption rate than the small car.
drive(int) - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.objects.SmallCar
The Small Car uses fuel at a constant consumption rate of 20km per 1lt of fuel.
driveNegativeKm() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.LargeCarTest
Test that if you pass a negative number to the method, it'll throw a IllegalArgumentException
drivePassNegativeKM() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.SmallCarTest
Test that a IllegalArgumentException is thrown when attempting to drive a negative amount of km's.
driveValid() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.SmallCarTest
Test that you're able to drive a valid distance in the Car and that the correct amount of fuel (to fill up) is returned.
driveValidOver50km() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.LargeCarTest
Test that when driving over 50km, the correct amount of fuel is used and the required amount to re-fill the car is returned.
driveValidUnder50km() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.LargeCarTest
Test that you're able to drive the car a valid amount and the amount of fuel used returned is correct.
driveWhenNotRented() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.LargeCarTest
Test that if you attempt to drive the car before it has been rented, an IllegalStateException is thrown.
driveWhenNotRented() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.SmallCarTest
Test that a IllegalArgumentException is thrown when attempting to drive a Car when it hasn't been rented.
driveWithoutFuel() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.LargeCarTest
Test that if you attempt to drive the car without it having an fuel that a IllegalStateException is thrown.
driveWithoutFuel() - Method in class uk.ac.ncl.jcarlton.testing.objects.SmallCarTest
Test that a IllegalArgumentException is thrown when attempting to drive the Car without fuel.
